content.detailedDescription:
I was checking my mailbox when i saw the object.  it was huge, and very close.  i tried to stop traffic;  pointing up at it and shouting "what is that".  no one stopped, but blew their horns at me to get out of the road. i could have been easily hit.
the object was brilliantly red in the center, and brilliantly orange around like a corona.  i am familiar with aeronautics and meteoritical phenomena. what angers me is:  i was nearly nearly run down by traffic who refused to look up at what i was pointing to, and yelling, what was over their heads:  "what is that"???  blowing their horns for me to get out of the road, and then speeding around me.  not one stopped to look up!  this thing was huge!  very frustrating for me.  i just wanted a witness.  'could have been struck for it.
content.summary: Huge, brilliant, none movement, then slow, then motionless again.  changing direction.  had to be hundreds of miles in size.  blinding red center with orange corona.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Joshua tree for contact in the desert ufo watch with melinda leslie using military night vision goggles. first a white/glue sphere popped out of the sky very low and we watched it ascend with a more blue sphere following after it. we saw more blue with a purplish color, 2 green, and one red. some of them flashed back at us when we clicked out our lasers at them, they were responding to us! some of them met up in a triangle formation, but i kept my eye on the third one that had come out. with the military night vision goggles it reminded me of a jelly fish, almost translucent with a hollow bottom that draped or swayed with fuzzy sides.Its the most complicating thing to describe. with the naked eye they were glowing in pure color and had an orb form.
content.summary: Contact in the desert

content.detailedDescription: While beachcombing w my gf in poet angeles, we observed a dark ufo emerge from a cloud over the harbor. we had been commenting on the oddness of the ling, thin, spirally dense cloud on a clear day, and were already photographing the cloud when the object emerged, as if on cue, "posed" as it were, for one shot then retreated back within the cloud.
content.summary: Observing a strange cloud in otherwise cloudless sky, i sae a dark object emerge, then return behind/within cloud

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside a little before 10pm to stargaze. at approximately 10:30pm pst, i observed a starlike object moving from north to south. i'd say it was 45-50 degrees above the horizon. i attempted to film the object but i couldn't pick it up with my sony camcorder even with night vision enabled. the object went behind some palm trees in our front yard and i lost sight of it.

approximately 15 minutes later my wife came outside. she asked if i had seen anything and i told her about my failed attempt to record a starlike object moving across the sky. roughly 1 minute later, my wife exclaimed "what's that!" she was pointing almost straight up. i immediately noticed what i believed to be the same starlight object moving across the sky. this time the object was moving from south to north.

i immediately got my sony camcorder going and thankfully i was able to pick up the object so i began filming it. i obtained a little over a minute of video footage. at the 25 second mark, a plane flying at a lower altitude crosses the path of the object. the plane is moving from west to east. you can tell the difference between the plane and the object. i think this was a propeller driven plane but i am not 100% sure. you can also see some stars in the sky too. eventually i lost the object due to obstruction from my rain gutter and roof.

as mentioned, i made this video on 8mm tape converting it to mpeg-2 format using 2.0 video grabber. i also made a duplicate video using stabilizing software from arcsoft. so you can view the original video and a more stabilized video. 

weather conditions at time of the sighting:

visibility 9 miles
no cloud cover
wind west at 4mph
pressure 29.99
temperature 63 degrees
dewpoint 58 degrees
content.summary: White starlike object filmed

content.detailedDescription: Me and my mom were lying on the deck at our house at sunset and we saw the first few stars come out. while we were looking up at the sky we saw what we thought was a sat-alight pass by it started changing directions and disappear and reappear. while it was happening i questioned if my eyes were playing tricks on me because i was under the influence but my sober mom and my dad eventually did witness the event and had the same reaction as me. after about a minute the object passed by some trees and we couldn't see it anymore.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star like object changing directions and randomly disappearing and reappearing

content.detailedDescription: The apartment building i live in is non-smoking. i go outside, quite often at night,to smoke. tonight, the weather was nice, so i took a chair with me and sat outside for awhile with my fiance and a neighbor. as we were talking, i leaned my head back to look at the stars. i took notice of one that seemed to be moving, and learned that it actually was. a very steady pace, seemingly too fast to be an airplane. i heard no sound to accompany it. i watched as it traveled on a straight path, roughly heading north-west. i lost sight of it as my neighbor noticed another one moving west. this one i never caught sight of, however, another one caught my attention moving south. i followed this one until it got overhead and vanished from sight. i assume it left the atmosphere. i kept watching the skies for signs of more, and sure enough, another one came from the north heading in a south-east direction, however, this one seemed almost to have a snake-like flight path. i watched this one until i couldn't see it, any longer. my neighbor and i stopped watching skyward and began discussing what we witnessed and eventually we all returned, indoors. this began around 11:20 p.M. and we came inside around 11:45 p.M. after eating a small snack, i went back outside at about 12:10 a.M. for another cigarette, and 3 of my other neighbors were outside. i told them about the earlier sighting and, as we talked, i looked up just to see if there might be more. sure enough, a fifth one was there, and i pointed it out. 2 of the 3 that were out there were able to see it. they agreed it was too high up to be an airplane. on top of this observation, i don't believe there would be 5 separate airplanes in the same area of sky within an hour. they were so high up, they looked like faint star light, yet you could easily tell they were moving.
content.summary: 5 separate craft observed moving in differing directions. looked like stars until movement was observed.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside by myself smoking a cigarette in the backyard. i was googling things on my ipad when i happened to look up and saw a triangle formation of lights just to my left really close. i dropped everything and ran inside to get my husband. i knew right away this wasn't a plane, stars or planets. i ran inside yelling for my husband and he came out. in the ten seconds it took for me to run inside all but one orb was still there but it had moved. at first my husband accused me of being crazy and said it was just a plane, but right next to the orb was an actual plane. the orb was bigger then the plane and it was obvious. he was amazed, then we started noticing more and more orbs coming from the horizon or taking off from somewhere. my husband knew no one would believe us so he called for our neighbor to come out and tke a look. he and his girlfriend came out and were also in just pure amazement, then others in our building started hering the commotion and came outside to see what we were doing. we saw over twenty of these orange orbs going at speeds i have never seen before in my life. it couldn't have been flares because they were ascending and changing direction. all of them would get to a certain height and they all would dim their lights one by one.... then the most amazing thing happened. as these things dimes there lights which almost looked as if they were blinking out they would start shoooting across the sky with no noise, and at speeds i have never ever seen in my life! we all witnessed the same thing and we have no idea what it was but we do know it was no plane, blimp, hot air ballon, flare ext.. these were truly un identified flying obje cts. my neighbor got even better video than me and we coul d get it to you if interested. i took mine from my ipad and ipads don't take good videos. hers were quite clear. all of us are in agreement we witnessed something truly unique and we all came up with nothing explainable as to what this could have been, these orbs just kept coming from what looked like they were taking off but could have came from the horizon. we watched over twenty as they darted across the sky right next to eachother, changing directions, and speeds. truly amazing. i am not a good writer so please feel free to contact myself and the others for an even better description of what we witnessed.

thank you,
dara hoberg
content.summary: Myself including 7 other people saw orbs flying at tremendous speeds with no noise, ascending and changing direction

content.detailedDescription: We were fishing with our kids on kure beach pier.  i was observing a red light that had been stationary approx 2-3,000 ft above the ground due west from my location.  i then observed the object begin to accelerate in same altitude at this time my husband also observed the object accelerate due north.  initially he was not all that interested until the object changed direction rapidly headed back due south same distance and same altitude.   my husband and i then observed the object descending out of sight from our vantage point into the cape fear river basin near ft fisher.  the immediate change in direction is what really captivated us.  it defies any current knowledge or physics for such an immediate change in direction and the rapid yet instant acceleration, meaning it accelerated at its terminal speed instantly and then changed direction in the same manner.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Observed from kure beach pier.  object hovering for long period then accelerated rapidly for approx 1 mile due north then immediately changed direction due south descending into cape fear river area near ft fisher

content.detailedDescription:
i was out on my apartment porch, enjoying the early evening weather. i have always been an astronomy enthusiast and make an effort to look at the sky and test my knowledge of constellations and solar system objects. 

   i was looking west over the buildings, and noticed the sudden appearance of a bright light between the constellations gemini and auriga. the light entered in a north-east direction and at first i thought it was a meteorite or iridium flare. it had a slight trail of light following it to a tapered point. what really caught my attention was that it appeared to decelerate. the object then abruptly stopped and executed a 90 degree turn, headed north. the object then continued on the new trajectory for about 5 seconds until it disappeared. 

   the ufo did not make any perceivable noise, nor did it move like a conventional aircraft / natural object. the only other object in my sight was a commercial airplane, traveling in a south east direction a few minutes prior.
content.summary: Bright light enters atmospher, then makes 90 degree turn.

content.detailedDescription: This is now the third time i have seen this on the approx same course but a touch higher in altitude each time, i live near stanstead airport and the planes start coming in lower to land and at night have their landing lights on and they are a bit dazzling, so i make sure it is not a plane as no other strobe light ect which planes are showing but as it came towards my address from the south west i fired a 5,000 milli watt hand laser in front of it and then behind it and then i fired directly at it but no reaction from it but as i was firing at it a plane coming in a bit low to land at stanstead had full view of what was happening and i kept the laser beam on the ufo as a warning to the aircraft and they must have seen it as well and possibly used their radio because about 20 mins later another passenger jet taking off from stanstead flying low heading south then changed course onto the same course the ufo had taken but it could have been coincidence but is this the same ufo it could well be flying the same course each time but a little higher each time.
content.summary: White ball star like object

content.detailedDescription: While visiting a friend in gulf breeze, florida, while walking in park near the bay bridge i saw a single disc-shaped orb come from the east suddenly and coming to a hovering stop over the bay bridge. once coming to a stop roughly 30 ft above the bridge, the object emitted a singular beam of light down upon the bridge...Several vehicles crossing the bridge hit their brakes and slowed as the beam followed a particular car for roughly 5 seconds, then moved upward and further along the bridge where it repeated the same activity several times until two helicopters appeared and immediately the object moved slowly across the bridge sideways and bolted upwards and out of view at an incredible rate of speed once one of the helicopters approached. lights in the park i and two others were walking in dimmed and sirens went off and dogs began barking.
content.summary: Disc shaped orb with lights on sides and bottom rising and hovering over bridge emitting beam over cars on bridge

content.detailedDescription: I was driving with my wife east on toll 45 near round rock/pflugerville area. i commented on all the colors of the rainbow, i'm a photographer and rainbows have always fascinated me. this one had all the colors visible with yellow right in the middle. it was bright in color, but you could still see the clouds through it. i noticed a dark object appear, literally looked like something out of a movie shape wise. i pointed it out to my wife and she saw it too. as i drove we both fixated on the dark object. the object moved to the right (south) slowly while we were drive straight towards it. it exited the rainbow went into a small light colored cloud, but didn't exit. it appeared to cloak itself with the sky around it. it went from dark to a slow, but quick near invisible shape until we both lost it. i wish we would have snapped pics or a video, but i was driving 75mph and we were both completely fixated on what we were seeing. i've witnessed a set ufo (lights) a few miles west of this area, a few years ago, but this time it was daytime and the object was definitely there and definitely not any shape i could find relevance to. we live in a flight path, so i've seen from all angles what shape a plane can look like and this looked so large and had such a funky shape that the thought of it being an airplane instantly went away. made my hairs stand up on my arms and neck!
content.summary: Object appeared in yellow part of rainbow hovered then slowly move s/se, disappeared in cloud

content.detailedDescription: Okay i submitted this report and spoken w john ventre but ti no avail,im so certain on what happened im submitting report again,on the night prior to the bloodmoon event my girlfriend and i witnessed a ufo flap in bucks county,we sere in awe of themi felt the heat and i spoken w mufon and they did not come out to meet w my girlfriend and i,we have video and cell photos,it's been on my mind ever since it happened there was no noise,next time it happens im gonna get better informed information i take this serious i dont make ip stories,for ur info tje pope was im town that weekend and it was some dort of judgement day,i googled that date,thsnks ken and karin,also,not chinese lanterns or signs theu went parrell to the road,
content.summary: September 26,2015

content.detailedDescription: It all began when i was awakened, about a year ago with a very loud "bam" (like a blast of a cannon) in my left ear. i went to my doctor last year when this happened and he said everything looked fine within both of my ears. ever since then, i have been experiencing sounds in that ear that sound like morse code (even right now), and sometimes ringing, beeps and humming noises (all electronic like sounds) . i also hear taps, pops and ticks on my ceiling and walls inside my house, especially in the living room, master bedroom and office. i cannot escape this and it is very tormenting to me. i also see blurps of light out of the corner of my eyes, sometimes what seem to be a very dim light that flashes in the room but my boyfriend does not hear or see any of these things. my dog does fixate on something everyday and night and then turns to look at me when i notice her staring. about a month or two ago i started believing that my neighbors are somehow involved with this and that they are monitoring me by video and audio equipment. i thought that all of this was coming from up in the rafters, through the air ducts behind the metal grills around the inside house. sounds crazy, i know! i truly feel watched all of the time. one night, about may 14th or the night of the full moon, i decided to stay up after my boyfriend was asleep and try to catch these people in the act. i shined my flashlight in every vent, one by one with all lights out. i kept hearing noises in every other room but the one that i was in. i kept seeing dim light flashing here and there and heard someone small walk across my roof. i went to the back sliding glass door that leads out to my back yard and i thought i saw a small one man tent that was illuminated by the light of the full moon. i figured these "kids" were brazenly camping out in the yard. i didn't see any movement and it didn't quite look like it fully was on the ground. i started to get real scared and did not want to shine my light on it for some reason. it felt like someone was right behind me so i decided to go back to bed. i got up the nerve once again to go back and look, it was gone. by this time the clock was 5:00 am. next day, my wrist watch was 10 minutes ahead, and since then my day setting, trips in half day increments. two weeks ago i had child like, two digit finger print bruises pop up on my left lower part of my arm. two days in a row i had what looked like a very small needle mark on my left arm in two different places with small dots of blood on my white sheets and comforter. i wake up with vaginal soreness on occasion. i now have what feels like a bone spur in the ball of my left foot that "just" popped up out of nowhere. i've changed every lock on my doors and even put a deadbolt on my office door. as of yesterday, i signed up with adt for three years. i am frightened at bedtime and sometimes keep a light on next to my bed and remain vigilant throughout the night . i am tired all of the time and can't talk to anyone about this for fear of being judged. beyond all of this, my 30 year old son recently found out that he has a benign brain cyst at the base of his brain, in the most dangerous spot for surgery. can anyone help me? i am sooo confused as to why this is all happening to me at this time and so recently.
content.summary: Heard taps and saw lights inside home. went to back sliding door and saw small white craft hovering about 1 foot above ground in my back yard.

content.detailedDescription:
Seven of us were joy riding in my dads car,i was driving. it was about 10 p.M. on a summer night. we came up to a stop sign and noticed that there were (what we thought were kids) playing on the swing sets at the grade school. which was about a half a block away. i pulled up at the school and whoever it was, was gone. 
i pulled up into the horseshoe drive all the way and thats when we seen it. hovering above the tree line. i could see the outline and the color was white. there was two white lights at each end of the wing tips. everybody started to scream and holler go! go! go! and then the third light lit up..Kind of. its opened almost like an eye pupil. like dialating. the light was an orange color.I floored the gas pedal and we spun out of there quick. i didnt hear it make any noise because we had a little boom box in the car. we were listening to metallica and the song green hell was playing. plus everybody screaming and crying.
we went to my friend's house and she told her dad about it. he grabbed a flashlight and we went back. he went into the woods and found nothing. he went home and we all went to a local pizza place,told other friends about it and drew pictures of what we seen. we all saw the same thing.
 it was getting late and the pizza place was closing. so i went to go start the car and it was making a horrible noise. like if you were to keep turning the ignition when the car was already running. everybody took off running like it was gonna explode! my friend's brother opened the hood and unhooked the battery. had to leave the car there and walk home. i have never been so terrified walking home alone. when i got home my dad wasnt home but my mom was. i told her about it and she didnt say anythhing. i heard my dad come in later on that night and he was angry. telling me i better go get his car. my mom told him that we seen something and he didnt believe any of it. i couldnt sleep all that night. 
in the next few days i heard that there was other sightings. not in the same place but within a few mile radius. 
i guess that i should add that the school was on a lakefront, and that one of the other sightings was above a lake.
content.summary: Seen some people that what we thought were kids playing on swing sets and went to go see who it was.

content.detailedDescription: I took 4 pictures of a cloud and noticed a blue round object at 4 different positions over a 15 second period. there were 4 white dots on the object.
content.summary: Blue circle with 4 white dots. look at the picture

content.detailedDescription:
1.) i was going for my morning walk on wednesday. i walked into town, and was planning to buy some water and head home.

2.) i looked up as i was turning to walk into the shopping center. it was the colors that made me notice it. i'd never seen anything like it before. and then it was tumbling. not floating, hovering, or flying - it was flying upward in a cartwheel-like manner. 

3.) i didn't know what to think because i'd never seen anything like it.

4.) it first looked black but then i saw colors. it would flash bright blue, yellow, and red. it started off below the clouds, but as it tumbled, it was rising so that it was very high, above the clouds. with my naked eye, i saw it tumbling. on my video, it appeared to jump suddenly from one place to the other very near the end of my video. when i finally stopped filming, it was because the drone had reversed its course and moved so it was positioned right over top of where i was standing.

5.) at first, i was amazed, it was beautiful. i had never seen anything like it. then i was worried it was going to hide so i asked it not to. of course, i was just thinking aloud. i didn't think whatever it was would end up positioning itself right above me, especially since it ended up moving in the opposite direction to do so.

i don't know what i saw, so i don't know if this was a coincidence, but all i know was it frightened me and i ducked into the shopping center. from that moment i was filled with terror. i was very much afraid, and i refused to walk home. i actually called my mom and asked for a ride. i felt very nervous for the remainder of the day. i only feel mild unease a couple of days later. 

6.) i stopped filming and fled into the store. i don't know what happened to the object after that.
content.summary: It was tumbling upward and changing colors

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was waiting for 6 o'clock news, when my grand children shouting aliens! aliens! with their mother and another nephew staying with us. 
2. i thought it was a laser or a beam of light coming from a naval ship.
3. one moving from south toward sswest
4. i called a news paper reporter , and text his was happened. 
5. dark clouds moving and covering the ufo 

i tried to take picture shot from my apple iphone with out seccess.
content.summary: Blue light(lining) shape of a large dish plate

content.detailedDescription:
It was in 1994 when i was 14 years old about 5 o 'clock p.M. and i was on my way to arheilgen which is a village in the vicinity of my home. i was sitting in the bus and the bus turned to the left side and drove along a corp field. i saw this brown, oval object moving slow above the corp field and than i thought it was a hawk or any other bird looking for some food but it was no bird but something that i was not able to identify. it was to big to be a bird. it also had an oval form and it didn't make any sounds. it moved slowly first, it had no lights and than it accelerated and moved very fast to the left side stopped immediately and than it flew back to where it first was. it changed its direction again to the right side and was again very fast and absolutely loudless, faster than an airplane! than it flew back to the position where i saw it for the first time.
it was no helicopter and no other familiar object. it all happened within one minute and i realized that it is an ufo. than it vanished. i haven't seen it again.
i am not sure if there has been any other observers but i am very sure that it was something that i cannot classify! 
as i have been working for years at frankfurt airport and at airplanes i can defininetely say that it was no airplane.
content.summary: I saw an oval object in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting at my computer and at the same time my wife took a stroll out on the sundeck and thats when she called me to tell me ufo ufo, i replied
really, its probably just a star.. but she shouted louder ufo.. so i said
skeptically  okay okay  im coming. when i looked up my jaw dropped as i was seeing somwthing in the sky that was totally unexplainable... i was a flight
service station specialist... also a meteorological technician so i can
differentiate the familiar from the unfamiliar.  when i looked with my naked eye looked like a glowing wing with lights atop another larger glowing wing
(the wings pointed at each other. the lower wing appeared to have a small
lighted fuselage from the middle. these things were all over the sky. i
turned my binoculars to look at others many were totally different-
instead of the winged shapes i now saw a very large dome filled with lights
that were non pulsating  and just below the dome a round ball also filled with lights... thru binoculars they were very bright and not pulsating...The object was stationary.... the sky was filled with them. occasionally when i was looking at one it would disappear and then reappear.  

conclusion: all of the objects appeared to be stationary, all were lit up.
,
there was no apparent motion nor any sound... occasionally an aircraft would fly by with blinking lights (my wife would comment at this point why doesnt the pilot see them)?  a few stars were out also but quite a few high
clouds...  these things because their were so many of them may have been below clouds.
i dont usually get excited about anything i see in the sky because im
quite familiar with aircraft, balloons, meteorites, ball lightning and quirky
weather phenomenon but i have no explanantion for what my wife and i saw this evening.
did not lose sight of the object... they may still be out there as im typing.,and yes they are   if they are stars then they have changed shape with many lights around them....
content.summary: Called by my wife i rushed outside with binoculars and couldn't believe what i saw, there appeared to be scores of thse objects,perhaps hundreds all over the sky, all lit up from south east and west also overhead.

content.detailedDescription:
Check my address on mapp’s. west heading east faster than planes followed maybe 2 minutes then light slowly disappeared. i live on the oregon coast line, maybe ufo flight line to land.  once moving over land light disappears. neighbors have seen this on their own, me alone & as a group. flight pattern sometimes north to south. 6th time i’ve seen this within 12 months at night only. 

when i was 7 years old dad, brother, grandma, neighbors & i saw a domed disk. portland national guard dispatched f-14's and they messed with it then left at amazing speed x 65th se duke portland, or.
content.summary: Bright light, my amber/red tracking w to e then light slowley went out

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Oh my way back from work, just as i turned town west main to go east, i stopped my bike to catch my breath. i looked to the sky and noticed a red flickering light, almost like a giant red candle in the sky. i couldn't have been the only one who saw it, because some people who were out walking saw it as well. i thought it could be mars at first, but mars doesn't flicker. so as i rode my bike further and approached douglass avenue, i noticed a blue orb shot up from the horizon behind the trees, toward the object. where the object was from my pov, was behind the trees, so i couldn't see if the object was engulfed by the red flickering light or not. soon after, i saw the blue light go back from the direction which the red light was at. by the time i was able to see the red light again, the area it was at had been covered by a thin layer of clouds. i could see stars through the thin layer of clouds still, but it was too thick for me to see if any of the "stars" were the flickering light. 

i'm a skeptic on ufo's, every sighting i've encountered had been explained away, but i've no explanation for this.
content.summary: Fireball seen over oshtemo area east of kalamazoo with a blue orb

content.detailedDescription: I seen an object moving slowly north. i called my fiance out to see it cause it was odly lit. when she came out a completly separate pure yelow bolt when east to west faster than lighting and flashed a geometric shape. happend in under a second. i lost sight of the second object still in disbelief of the pattern i just seen extend over 2 km in the sky. the second object witch was rediscovered when it stopped hovering and creeped up in speed changing direction to north east. it picked up speed stopped then ascended strait up or up and back out of vision.  the first object i seen was star like the second a tear drop like an orb with a tail however it was all yellow.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 objects completely different behaviors

content.detailedDescription: I had stepped outside to smoke. the sky was partly cloudy with stars visible. i noticed a strange orange glow close to the horizon off to the south. it would flash then cut off then flash again in a few minutes. i heard no sound so i ruled out lightning. i called my roommate outside to see if he saw it and he did. neither one of us could identify it as we had never seen anything like it it. it lit up a large portion of the sky. after about an hour and a half it slowly faded and dissapeared.
content.summary: Unknown large flashes of orange light in  the in night sky with no weather phenomenon  present flashing every few minutes with large intensity for over an hour

content.detailedDescription:
8 or 9 total bright orange balls rise from behind tenement and ascend into sky.  2 or 3 leading, climbing and heading southward in a vertical line. followed by 2 more on horizontal axis, forming a triangle at the bottom of the vertical line.  these eventually disappeared into a cloud. 
  shortly afterwards, 4 or 5 followed the initial formation, individually, in a fairly straight vertical line. a cessna sized plane crossed the sky from west to east, as another light appeared, rising, from behind the city tenement. it crossed in front of the bottom of the cloud that the orange spheres were entering.
  the difference between the airplane and the spheres was significant.  the airplane made a great deal of sound.  the balls were silent. we frequently see commercial aircraft pass near our apartment, and unlike those many distant aircraft, we were unable to notice any distinguishing structural features of the orange balls.
  we observed the final ball travel through the cloud, and we saw that it must have ascended to a great height, as i was able to watch it grow very distant and faint.
  when the first sphere was sighted, i was alone, smoking a cigarette on my fire escape. once the spheres flying in formation had almost reached the clouds, i went indoors to quickly wake my girlfriend so that she could witness the event as well.  she did not observe the spheres flying in formation, but she saw that spheres that followed behind them, and also was present while the aircraft passed close to them.
content.summary: 8 or 9 bright orange spheres. flying individually and in formation.

content.detailedDescription: I was headed south on roods lake road at with my boyfriend, and just after we passed haines road, right before we got to the dupont airport, at approximately 10:50 pm, a  ufo ascended straight up from the woods right next to our car, then hovered for about three seconds over the treetops. while i couldn't make out the shape, there were three distinct lights, arranged in a triangle pattern. at first i assumed it was a helicopter, but this object was incredibly close to us, and was not making a sound, and there was no wind coming from it. the lights were flashing different colors, randomly, alternating between white, blue, green, and red. after it hovered for a few seconds over the treetops, it headed south, towards bowers road. it passed bowers road and kept going, but as soon as i turned left on bowers, i saw it also turned left, though  still about a half mile south of where i was. it headed north, towards our car, and came within 800 feet of us, before it stopped, swung its tail end around, then headed northwest, towards the dupont airport, near where we originally saw it. june 2 (the day prior to this incident), i had been feeling uneasy, almost as if i had been being watched, so when this happened, that feeling intensified, along with a bit of anxiety. ive witnessed ufos before, and anxiety always accompanied those sightings. we lost sight of the object when we were heading east, and the ufo proceeded northwest. right after we lost sight of the craft itself, there was a bright flash of red light in its general direction
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ascended from then hovered over treetops, headed south, followed my car going east, then went west

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting on our outside patio and my wife exclaimed "look at that" i looked in the direction that she was pointing and we both saw this fireball object entering the atmosphere and burning up. we thought it was a meteorite entering the atmosphere. but but it lasted much longer than any other falling star that i have seen. then it broke into 5 glowing orange spheres that just hovered and moved in unison. then they slowly descended below the tree line and we lost sight. the whole event lasted about 30+ seconds. they hovered for  at least 10 to 15 seconds time enough for me to go in my house to get my camera and then i couldn't get a picture. now my neighbor says it might have the golden nights parachute team that is to perform tomorrow in myrtle beach for our local festival. but at after 10pm at night????? but maybe. anyway just thought i would post this.
content.summary: Fire ball descending from sky in the dark but burning then broke up into 5 glowing spheres

content.detailedDescription:
On holiday with family, sat on the balcony overlooking st georges bay near st julian's in malta.  the glowing caught my eye emitting from an oval shaped ufo about 650-800 feet above the bay. at first i thought it was strange because i have not seen this aircraft before. 
the event must have lasted only 7-10 seconds, it was glowing a bright white light from the body, no details to see other than shape and speed and direction it flew. i watched it for a couple of seconds glowing then soon as i said to my husband "look!" it started to fly up and away, the shape changed from oval to circle as it flew up and away very fast and within seconds was a dot barley visible next to a star, then it disappeared. 
i was calm, i then thought i should probably report this to someone, googled it and this site came up as the place to do it. i will report to the police even though i'm sure they will assume i am crazy or drunk - i'm neither, just am english mum on holiday with her family.
content.summary: Bright oval shaped ufo that shot up into space turning circular and then to a dot and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was on i-75 near hamtramck driving it didn't look normal it was bright in the sky is thought it was a bird it hovered and went west to east moving back and forth over the freeway it kept moving back and forth in a straight  line freaked out confused  and then started taking pics i  turn around to talk to someone and lost sight of the object.
content.summary: It moved a lot when i was looking at it

content.detailedDescription:
This was about 10 years ago; we thought of reporting it at the time but it seemed more difficult to report back then for some reason. it might be useful information.

it was a very clear sunny summer day, not a cloud in the sky (i don't remember the month) at approximately 12 noon to 2:00 p.M.  my boyfriend and i were coming out of central park in new york city and had crossed central park west to the northwest corner. 
 
we looked up to say what a beautiful day it was and then noticed objects way, way, way up in the sky, all in a straight line, 6 to 10 individual round objects, like tiny balloons, just sitting there with equal space between each object, in the northwest sky over central park.  they weren't crowded together but all looked very comfortably placed. they were each a different color and seemed to shine/sparkle somewhat and they looked like primary colors but other colors too. i remember thinking it was odd to be able to distinguish any color of something that was so far away.  we immediately looked around us and saw that many people were all looking up at the same thing and were visibly perplexed. i would say most people kept looking up for at least a full 5 to 10 minutes or so but the objects just stayed still.  

we walked away wondering what we were looking at, when they had gotten there and how long they would stay there. the objects seemed imposing and it was unsettling to think that they could be really, really large objects that looked like specs because they were so far up in the atmosphere.  the colors were pretty to look at against the blue sky but it felt like a disquieting experience and we felt helpless at not knowing what the objects were.

maybe other people reported this too.
content.summary: 6 to 10 round objects very high in the atmosphere in a straight line, stationary formation
